downloadTitle: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2006 Management Pack for Microsoft System Center OpsMgr 2007
downloadDescription: The Host Integration Server 2006 MP for Microsoft System Center Operations Manager 2007 monitors the health of computers running Host Integration Server components on the Microsoft Windows Server 2003 operating system. Requires the Backward Compatibility MP version 6.0.5000.12 (or higher).

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2006 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.MSI
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/3/7/b/37b2dc17-0b26-4cb1-a6df-a0db492e32e4/Microsoft Host Integration Server 2006 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.MSI

detailsSection:
The Microsoft Host Integration Server 2006 Management Pack provides monitoring functionality for Host Integration Server 2006 computers running on Microsoft Windows Server 2003, and is supported for use with Microsoft System Center Operations Manager 2007. This management pack provides monitoring of key Host Integration Server components, including SNA Connections and TN3270, TN5250, Print, Session Integrator, and host transaction resynchronization services. This MP requires the Backward Compatibility MP version 6.0.5000.12 (or higher).

The Management Pack consist of following features:
• Host Integration Server 2006 Alert Monitoring
• Host Integration Server 2006 Health Indication and Monitoring
• Host Integration Server 2006 Performance Monitoring
• Automated configuration discovery and role-based assignment of monitoring rules
• An easy-to-understand and navigable processing rule group hierarchy
• Public views of Host Integration Server 2006 servers, alerts, and groups
• Operator tasks for use in response to common situations
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Host Integration Server 2006 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.MSI
systemRequirementsSection:
• Other Software:
    • Microsoft System Center Operations Manager 2007

    • Host Integration Server 2006
installInstructionSection: Please review the MP guide for installation instruction.
